chapters.title: Chapter 2: Rhuidean
chapters.info: Jasin Natael, p. 91 (66)—Gleeman/bard to the Dragon Reborn and his teacher. He has dark hair, and is taller than most non-Aiel men. He came into the Waste with Hadnan Kadere's wagons. He is actually Asmodean, but Rand dares not reveal even a hint of his true identity to anyone for fear that they will kill him for what he is, even though he is the only man who can teach Rand to channel. See also Asmodean; Nesossin, Joar Addam.
